body.p:
159
Feby 22d 5
W W Throckmoten Esq
Co "C." 21s Ky Infty
Huntsville Ala
Sir

Your communication of the 4th inst to his Excellency Governor Bramlette, has been referred to this office. We have no power to detail a person in the U S service to recruit.. The fort at -- Louisville is under the control of the U S authorities

Very Respectfully
D, W, Lindsey
Insp & Adj Genl Ky
